channel.title: Comments on: Essential Vim bundles for JavaScript and Clojure
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: Wrangling JavaScript with Vim | Oliver Caldwell's blog
item.dc:creator: Wrangling JavaScript with Vim | Oliver Caldwell's blog
item.description: […] created a few posts on here about writing JavaScript with Vim, this is because it’s what I do all day (and night) […]
item.content:encoded: […] created a few posts on here about writing JavaScript with Vim, this is because it’s what I do all day (and night) […]

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description: Oh I see what you mean, luckily it's actively maintained so these sorts of things should be fixed soon. I thought you meant it didn't indent at all, I've noticed the array + object issues for a while but just ignored it. If you fix the first occurrence manually, each other object is correct.
item.content:encoded: Oh I see what you mean, luckily it’s actively maintained so these sorts of things should be fixed soon. I thought you meant it didn’t indent at all, I’ve noticed the array + object issues for a while but just ignored it. If you fix the first occurrence manually, each other object is correct.

item.title: By: Oliver Weiler
item.dc:creator: Oliver Weiler
item.description:
Here you can find my .vimrc: https://github.com/helpermethod/vagrant-node-dev/blob/master/.vimrc
I've removed the vim-javascript plugin because the indentation broke and the colors where way off. Looking at the plugins issues, this seems to be a known problem:
https://github.com/pangloss/vim-javascript/issues/212 https://github.com/pangloss/vim-javascript/issues/193
item.content:encoded:
Here you can find my .vimrc: https://github.com/helpermethod/vagrant-node-dev/blob/master/.vimrc

I’ve removed the vim-javascript plugin because the indentation broke and the colors where way off. Looking at the plugins issues, this seems to be a known problem:

https://github.com/pangloss/vim-javascript/issues/212
https://github.com/pangloss/vim-javascript/issues/193

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description: Strange, how're you loading it? Do you have any other configuration or plugins that could conflict with it? I'll take a look if you have your config uploaded somewhere.
item.content:encoded: Strange, how’re you loading it? Do you have any other configuration or plugins that could conflict with it? I’ll take a look if you have your config uploaded somewhere.

item.title: By: Oliver Weiler
item.dc:creator: Oliver Weiler
item.description: I've recently tried vim-javascript and it seems the indentation is broken.
item.content:encoded: I’ve recently tried vim-javascript and it seems the indentation is broken.
